video.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
video.synopsis: Master of suspense Alfred Hitchcock brings his droll sensibility to the small screen in this legendary and iconic anthology series.

episodes.synopsis: A husband decides to get revenge on the man who attacked his wife. After defending her honor, he faces an even greater threat from her troubled past.
episodes.title: Revenge

episodes.synopsis: A pianist returns to his hometown and learns that his dad died. But the strange behavior of friends and family only fuels the musician's suspicions.
episodes.title: Premonition

episodes.synopsis: Maggie gets caught up in a feud and tries to stop two men who argued during a poker game, drew their guns and prepared for an old-fashioned duel.
episodes.title: Triggers in Leash

episodes.synopsis: Faking his wife's death comes back to haunt a husband when the wife returns with a brand-new attitude after spending seven long years in hiding.
episodes.title: Don't Come Back Alive

episodes.synopsis: When Diane's ailing mother disappears from a Paris hotel room, Diane's frantic search is hindered by strange events and the bizarre hotel staff.
episodes.title: Into Thin Air

episodes.synopsis: The woman who snitched on a gangster's now-dead brother is chased down by the criminal, who faces a soul-searching dilemma once he catches her.
episodes.title: Salvage

episodes.synopsis: An emotionless man finds himself in a terrifying situation where expressing fear and sadness could mean the difference between life and death.
episodes.title: Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: Fearing his new cook is a wanted murderer, Ralph uncovers evidence that points directly to the cook and takes matters into his own inept hands.
episodes.title: Our Cook's Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Charlie finds work driving a man cross-country. En route, Charlie discovers that his passenger will inherit a fortune and devises a plan to steal it.
episodes.title: The Long Shot

episodes.synopsis: Albert Pelham discovers that a look-alike is impersonating him. Pelham eventually catches his crafty doppelganger but loses a grip on his own sanity.
episodes.title: The Case of Mr. Pelham

episodes.synopsis: When the husband of the Cranes' neighbor Mrs. Verber mysteriously disappears, the Cranes unearth a body. But that's just the first shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Guilty Witness

episodes.synopsis: An ex-con takes a job as a department store Santa in hopes of robbing it, but his attitude changes when he witnesses a youth committing crimes.
episodes.title: Santa Claus and the 10th Avenue Kid

episodes.synopsis: After getting fired from his art museum job, Lyle Endicott gets close to an old woman whose sole mission is protecting her family's antique vase.
episodes.title: The Cheney Vase

episodes.synopsis: After he's fired, Benjamin Stepp goes after his boss. The next day at work, the boss he's certain he killed is waiting to give him a promotion.
episodes.title: A Bullet for Baldwin

episodes.synopsis: After his girlfriend dumps him, Sam Dunleavy plots to kill her. But matters get complicated when Sam's childhood friend -- now a cop -- shows up.
episodes.title: The Big Switch

episodes.synopsis: Criminal Sam Cobbett invades a farmhouse and holds a woman at knifepoint. But Sam fails to recognize the reason his hostage is acting so strangely.
episodes.title: You Got to Have Luck

episodes.synopsis: A reporter looking for an interview goes to the home of Lizzie Borden, where her questions cause Lizzie's sister Emma to have a nervous breakdown.
episodes.title: The Older Sister

episodes.synopsis: Two retired insurance salesmen decide to trail a hot-tempered woman on a sizzling day to see whether the oppressive heat causes her to explode.
episodes.title: Shopping for Death

episodes.synopsis: Ralph Cowell kills his creditor but can't find the note that he wrote a year earlier. A vagrant witnesses the murder and begins blackmailing Cowell.
episodes.title: The Derelicts

episodes.synopsis: Detective Krovitch investigates a murder at a run-down vaudeville theater and gets a hot lead from the ventriloquist's dummy.
episodes.title: And So Died Riabouchinska

episodes.synopsis: After visiting a communist country, Mary befriends soccer player Jan on the train. Jan asks Mary to hold a watch for him until they cross the border.
episodes.title: Safe Conduct

episodes.synopsis: When a stranger shows up at a monastery, Father Vincente realizes he's lying about his identity and is really out to get revenge on a man named Rocco.
episodes.title: Place of Shadows

episodes.synopsis: A man plans to kill his wife and bury her in their basement, unaware that she's been planning to convert their basement into a wine cellar.
episodes.title: Back for Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Worried that their Aunt Rosalie doesn't really like them, brothers Paul and Henri set out to get their hands on her fortune any way they can.
episodes.title: The Perfect Murder

episodes.synopsis: Con artists Frank and Lorna set out to rob an old woman by pretending to be relatives. Lorna's worried, but Frank is convinced she's an easy target.
episodes.title: There Was an Old Woman

episodes.synopsis: An angel allows a writer to relive his last day so he can find out who killed him, but the list of potential killers grows longer with each hour.
episodes.title: Whodunit

episodes.synopsis: To pay for his wife's operation, Mr. Crabtree takes a job working for the mysterious Mr. X, who asks him to manage a job involving a blackmailer.
episodes.title: Help Wanted

episodes.synopsis: At an art gallery, Mark is surprised when the art dealer hands over a portrait of Mark's first wife instead of the painting he'd originally purchased.
episodes.title: Portrait of Jocelyn

episodes.synopsis: An antiques dealer comes up with a clever way to raise money to pay off a loan. But things won't be as easy for the shop owner the second time around.
episodes.title: The Orderly World of Appleby

episodes.synopsis: After arguing with her boyfriend, Karen wakes up in a jail cell with no recollection of what transpired and is told that she committed murder.
episodes.title: Never Again

episodes.synopsis: A gambler makes a bet with an American: Spend the night in a bedroom that's haunted by the ghost of a murderer who escaped from a mental institution.
episodes.title: The Gentleman from America

episodes.synopsis: Police question nanny Lottie Slocum about the murder of her employer, Mrs. Nash. Later, Lottie admits she likes the now-widowed Mr. Nash.
episodes.title: The Baby Sitter

episodes.synopsis: When his schoolteacher crush reveals she's engaged to another man, Clint goes on a murderous rampage and hides out in the school's bell tower.
episodes.title: The Belfry

episodes.synopsis: After his fiancée is killed by a car, Dana Edwards is overcome with grief. Then, a stranger whose son was killed in the same way offers to help.
episodes.title: The Hidden Thing

episodes.synopsis: Howard's wife is wooed by Prince Burhan, who threatens suicide unless Irene runs away with him. But an old friend discovers all is not as it seems.
episodes.title: The Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Paula discovers that the fur coat her hairstylist sold her was stolen. When a man calls Paula to discuss the mink, she eagerly agrees to meet him.
episodes.title: Mink

episodes.synopsis: When Gil Larkin confronts his lover's abusive husband, Gil somehow loses consciousness. When he wakes up, Gil learns he's a murder suspect.
episodes.title: Decoy

episodes.synopsis: With a strangler on the loose, Ellen's husband Steve has all the locks changed. When the locksmith arrives, Steve calls from work with startling news.
episodes.title: The Creeper

episodes.synopsis: Dick's wife badgers him into demanding back pay from his boss, who tells him there's simply no money left. But Dick takes matters into his own hands.
episodes.title: Momentum
